source_reference.text: BOUNDARIES IN CHRISTIAN DATING || What YOU need to know! (Video by Ronnie and Mel)

content_summary:
Should Christians kiss before marriage? What about sex before marriage? If you have never thought through the boundaries in Christian dating YOU need, then this video is for you! 

Ronnie and Mel give us some dating & relationship advice that you need as Christians. So if you are serious about dating God's way and walking in sexual purity, lets dive in and see what Christian Dating Boundaries & tips Ronnie and Melissa Faisst recommend to guard our hearts in our relationships.We will talk through Physical, emotional, communication, time and spiritual boundaries and why they are important in dating.

R O N N I E  &  M E L  //  Ronnie Faisst, a professional freestyle motocross pioneer turned preacher. Melissa Faisst, a motocross model turned missionary! & on this channel, we help YOU find God & walk with Jesus in your everyday life!

Christianity doesn't have to be complicated, it can actually be cool! And we want to equip you to find your purpose & walk in your God-given destiny!

So check out our other videos & subscribe for WEEKLY teaching + advice videos here: https://bit.ly/2RhLJOo

You can also visit us on our website, ronnieandmel.com or find us on social at @RonnieandMel!
